Im not one to leave review but I'm disappointed I love the look of the boots but I have had them three weeks, and the elastic is stretched out already!!! I am not someone who has big calfs so this makes me frustrated, after like the second wear they started to become stretched. I was so excited for these boots becuse I love how they look on but honestly I could bearly wear them after the first week. If you look at the pictures you can see they are big on me, and how stretched they have become from only a few wearings.

Boots are excellent. They are lightweight, but not flimsy- just not as heavy as other boots. They are comfortable- I just walked around NYC wearing them and my feet are good. Def recommend, especially for the price.

I like this boots combine leather with knit fabric，and it can softly support my calf to keep my feet warm.I think this boots suit for wearing in the autumn or winter.The boots have low heel,but this kind of height won't bother you to walk for all day.
reviews.review_header: I like this boots combine leather with knit fabric，and it can ...

reviews.review_text: I read other reviews that they run large and i select a half size smaller than my regular size , and they still have a little space for extra confort. They are very very very confortable!! I recommend this boots for big calfs girls. I have a 18 inch calf and still have space for sock and jeans. Very happy of this purchase.
reviews.review_header: I recommend this boots for big calfs girls

reviews.review_text: Love them! They fit me perfectly, and look great!

These boots are great! The reason for four stars and not five is that they don't provide any arch support. They do run about a half size larger, but that's ok because I was able to add some insoles for support and they fit perfectly. Although it has elastic at the top of the boots, if you have wide calves, you'll want to order the wide calf boot as it is a little snug at the top of the boot, even with the elastic. There is good traction on the sole of the boots, so, it should be good for walking and not slipping on smooth surfaces. All in all I'd recommend the boots.

Bought these boots a few days ago and I'm in love! The dark gray is as shown, and matches everything! I wear a 10B and these fit great with some room for thick socks. I also have huge calves and can never find a boot that zips all the way up, but these have a TON of stretch and I can zip them up and tuck in my pants as well! The sole is nice and thick, and the insole is comfy, which is nice since I need support for my arches. Because the sole is thicker, the boots have a bit more weight than sneakers or pumps, but that is hardly a concern. :)
reviews.review_header: Ordered the Gray Knit style (Gray 27) Perfect color! Perfect Fit (10 B) for my thick calves!

name: Forever Mango 27K Little Kids Combat Lace Up Boots

reviews.review_text: I love these boots. But they run not a little big, but extremely big. I brought these for my 4yr old granddaughter, she wears a size 9. I read the reviews and some said that they run big. I ordered her a 9, we always go up a size in her shoes anyway. But because they run big I ordered her actual shoe size, these boots are a size 11, which is 2 sizes to big, she will not be able to wear these for another year or more. Don’t want to go the the hassle of sending them back so I’m going to keep them, she’ll grow into them. Like I said I love the boots, items arrived as expected, size was my only issue.
Love this boots fit well and she loved wearing them all day !!!
I purchased these boots for my daughter to match my combat boots. These are her new favorite go too boots. The quality is great and so is the price.

My daughter loved them. She wanted a pair like Mal from the Descendants movies, I thought these were similar, and when they arrived she knew they were "Mal boots". She's been wearing them every day for almost 2 weeks now.

Very cute boots, pretty well made. I’m excited for when she can wear them which will probably be a year from now because they are very large!! My daughter wears a 9 in all shoes and has been for over a month. I bought a 9 they are closer to an 11/12.

Bought these for my daughter who loves them. They fit well with a bit of room in the toe for those rapidly growing feet. They look and feel nice. Only drawback is they come with rolled laces that come untied easily.

These boots look amazing. They were purchased SS a Christmas gift for my younger granddaughter who LOVES shoes. (It's generic. Her mom and I save the same gene.) I know she will love them. Hope they fit OK.

I bought these for my five year old little girl and she absolutely loves them! She wanted boots like Mommy so we could be twins in these were close enough lol. She wears them 5 out of 7 days a week. They go with everything. They just add an edgier look to all of her little outfits. I'm not sure how long they will last for but I'm ready to buy again when this pear gets worn out.

name: Susanny Suede Flat Platform Sneaker Shoes Plus Velvet Winter Women's Lace Up Cotton Snow Boots

reviews.review_text: These boots are so cute. I really wanted to love them, but my reasoning for 2 stars is for 2 reasons. 1. They arrived on time, but the packaging was terrible! They weren't in a box they came shoved in a huge bubble envelope and then that was duct taped shut. It was almost as if someone returned them like that and they just shipped it off to me. Because the packaging was terrible the boots were basically ruined. They were indented and bent and I couldn't get them back to the original shape. This is the first time I have ever experienced bad packaging through amazing. 2. They run small. I'm a true size 11, my whole life I've never had to go up or down a size in a shoe no matter what the brand. This to me fits more like a 10. If you want these I would consider ordering a size up. If the packaging was better and they would have actually fit then I do believe these boots would have been 4-5 stars. Super cute true to color and very warm.
reviews.review_header: I really wanted to love them, but my reasoning for 2 stars is ...

reviews.review_text: These boots are really cute!!! They are very comfortable because of the plush lining and run true to size- I even have room to wear a thicker sock. The price is really low so if you're on the fence, give them a try,
reviews.review_header: These look GREAT and are really comfortable!!!

reviews.review_text: Due to other reviews mentioning that these run small, I ordered a half size up. Which may have been fine had the toe area not tapered in so much. The pictures make these seem like they have a more rounded toe, but they do not. After a half hour of walking it felt like my little toenails were going to rub right off. I also didn't like the uneven insole. Not comfortable at all. Not to mention the glue or something that is on the fabric. (See picture) One other thing, there's a seam in the toe front of the outer sole which makes them look super cheap. (See picture) Which they are.
I had to return both the 10 1/2 and the 11 size booths, was too small. The price is great and they look expensive just could not find the right fit.

I wasn't expecting great quality but these are crap. First the lining is stuck in the shoe lace holes. Second, the shoes literally gave out the second day I wore them! See picture. Don't waste your money!
reviews.review_header: I wasn't expecting great quality but these are crap

reviews.review_text: Just arrived, tried on...fits and looks great, color is exact and can't wait until winter to wear.

These shoes came in poor condition. They were shipped in a bag, which caused the cheap, black material to be creased and bent up before they were even worn. The black material is also not what I expected. It feels a little like cardboard. These shoes are not worth the price being charged. If I would have had the chance to try them on in a store, I would not have bought them. The biggest improvement that can be made is the shipment. I would have been less disappointed if they were shipped in a box. This would have made the conditions of the shoes better because they would not have had creases all over them. Also, I ordered a 7.5, but these feel more like a 7, would recommend going half of a size bigger. For fit, they also feel and look a little wide around the top of the feet by the toes. This may be different for others, but my feet are normal for width. On a positive note, if creases do not bother you, the fur on the inside was in nice condition and soft. I will not be returning these because of the fact that I do not want to go through the hassle or spend the money for it, but I would not recommend to anyone. Hopefully if you do buy these, they come in better condition than what I got. Best of luck.

I absolutely love these boots. They’re super soft inside, and they’re so darn cute. One word of caution: These are NOT true to size. I wear a size 9.5, and based on reviews I ordered a half size up, but they are still too small. I think I’ll need the size 11 if I want them to fit at all. I must say though that the company was super accommodating when I contacted them about this issue, and they already have another pair on the way. All in all, definitely order bigger than your normal size. If you do that then you'll be getting a great deal on a really lovely pair of boots.
reviews.review_header: Love the boots, but they are definitely NOT true to size.

name: DADAWEN Baby's Girl's Toddler Fashion Cute Bowknot Fur Lining Princess Warm Snow Boots

reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of these boots! They have heavy duty bottoms with great grip. The fur lining is very soft. They run true to size. Great purchase.
These are so adorable true to size and my niece loves them!

I ordered a pair almost exactly like these for my rough tough hard playing 3 year old last Year, and they lasted all winter, a little worse for wear by the end of the season, but they lasted and she loved them. Had her pick between these and another and she chose the same this year except they have a bow now. She is four now but still just as hard on shoes, so I am hoping they last again. Even if we have to end up cutting the decorative bow like last year, I'm okay with that, doesn't really take away from them with the fur and everything... Warm, cute, and for 18 bucks, well worth it.
reviews.review_header: I ordered a pair almost exactly like these for my rough tough hard playing 3 year ...

reviews.review_text: My goddaughter LOVED these! She's a sassy 5 year old and she walked around saying she wanted to be basic like her momma, so I got her a pair of matching (fake) Uggs and a Starbucks giftcard! She loved both...but loved the shoes more! She's currently in an 11 but I ordered an 11.5. Fits like a glove when she's wearing thick socks! Only negative - the bow isn't as cute in person as in the picture! Oh well!

These are so adorable and my toddler LOVES them! She kept telling me repeatedly how cozy they are and how much she loves them. They are true to size, so if you want to double up on socks for your little one on really cold days, I would suggest going up a size.
I ordered a size up and they just barely fit. Order up 2 sizes if you want something that can be worn for awhile. Cute boots
Perfect!
Cute boots!! I bought these for my daughter to wear over the holidays — even Santa liked them!!! ;-))

name: SODA Chance Women's Closed Toe Multi Strap Ankle Bootie

reviews.review_text: These boots are SO cute!! I usually wear a 9.5 and have a wide foot, I ordered a 10 and they fit great. Not tight, not loose, just right. I am so happy I purchased these and I will be ordering them in black ASAP!

I wasn't really sure about these shoes. Even though I loved the style, this is a company I don't recognize, the shoe is made of all man-made materials, and the price was pretty inexpensive. When I initially put them on, they felt a bit tight across the top of my foot. However, after wearing them for an entire day, I can say that they didn't hurt my feet at all (which is big deal, because I deal with foot pain almost daily and in most other pairs of shoes). They were actually quite comfortable. They look really nice and stylish too. As for quality, I'll give it some time to see how they hold up to frequent wear over time. At this price, I may very well get a few more colors. UPDATE: So I've been wearing these booties now for 3 months on an almost daily basis. I must say, they are holding up extremely well. I have so-called comfort shoes in my closet that I can't wear because they cause blisters. On the other hand, these booties are fantastically comfortable! They slip on and off quite easily, even with socks, and I can wear them all day and night and my feet don't hurt at the end of the day. I thought they were cheap shoes because of the price, but they have proven to be an excellent purchase. I am going to order another pair. This pair I have still looks like new, despite frequent wear over 3 months. I never heard of this company before these shoes, but I'll be ordering from them again! Oh, I also want to point out that no one has paid me for my review; it is based on my own experience with the product. I have somewhat wide feet and ankles that frequently swell, and the regular 7 fits me perfectly, where in other shoes, I might feel a bit squeezed.
reviews.review_header: Comfortable and stylish, great quality shoes!

reviews.review_text: I bought these shoes in the Dist Taupe and Black. Love the colors and exactly what I was expecting. The size also is what I expected. I wear between a size 9 - 9.5 so I sized up and got a 10 and although they’re a bit large, I’d rather that than too small. For being a budget friendly brand, these booties are fairly comfortable. By no means are they Vince Camuto’s, but in lieu of the $150 price tag, I will gladly accept these! I recognized the Soda brand but it wasn’t something that stood out to me until I went into my closet and noticed a good 1/3 of my shoes are by Soda! I apparently love this brand! Try these shoes out, you’ll be impressed with the price point quality.

This pair of boots looks like a much nicer pair than the price point. That being said, it’s not going to be able to compare with higher price point boots. For example, the “stacked heel” is printed on, but unless you are looking closely it’s hard to tell. Cut outs are clean and clear and give a fun detail that really makes the boot stand out. Super roomy and comfy inside. I am taking a star away as the sole isn’t padded and I will be buying an insole since I am used to more padding. If you aren’t used to super padded shoes (I.e. Sam Edelman’s or Fit Flops) you probably will find these to be very comfy out of the box! Overall super happy with a solid boot. Grey is a more warm taupe grey as opposed to a true grey or blueish grey.
reviews.review_header: This pair of boots looks like a much nicer pair than the price point

reviews.review_text: Love them and the color 💜💜💜💜

I am between a 7.5-8, and after ordering both, went with the 7.5s. These are the cutest shoe, and I have gotten lots of compliments on them. They are super comfortable and were an amazing deal. I am thinking about buying them in another color! This is the regular black, not the 'new' black.
reviews.review_header: Super cute, super comfy, super deal.

reviews.review_text: These boots are cute and go with lots of outfits, but they are not the most comfortable footwear I own. They feel a little off-balance, like one heel is taller than the other. It might just be because the footbed is not padded and the shoes are somewhat floppy on my feet (one leg is just a little longer than the other, but most of the time I don't notice it) but it's fairly easily fixed with 2 different thicknesses of shoe inserts. Probably would not have purchased if I had been able to try them on in a store first, but I make them work and they really are cute with both dresses and skinny jeans.

These shoes are SO much fun to wear. Many Many compliments. I wear a 7 or 6.5. After reading the reviews I went with the 6.5. They are a little big . Adding a pair of socks was the perfect solution. It doesn't detract from the open look at all!!

name: Brinley Co Women's Birdie Combat Boot

reviews.review_text: These boots are true to size and have a bit of wiggle room so they dont hurt your feet !!! Im a size 12 and have a hard time finding shoes that fit . I am very happy with these !!!!!

I bought these for casual weekday wear around the city, I wouldn't recommend actually taking them hiking! They are more form than function ;) FIT: Bad sizing, I had to go a full size down which is odd in shoes! FABRIC: Cheap and won't last long but that's what you expect for the price, and they look quite good from afar STYLE: Love the style, great classic boots OVERALL: Would be excellent if sizing was better
reviews.review_header: Good value boot - but beware odd sizing!

reviews.review_text: These boots are really cute! I have gotten a lot of compliments and they are very comfortable. I wore them for several hours with no pain in my feet and I am not one of those ladies who wears big heels all the time. Got my usual size 9 and the fit is like a glove.
reviews.review_header: Perfect fit, super cute, very comfortable boots

reviews.review_text: Go a full size up from your normal shoe size. They are great boots just a little snug around the toe area.
It was a little tight on my foot but it was very cute. I would definitely recommend getting inserts for the shoes because after a short time my feet were dying, there is NO cushion to the shoe.
super cute! just the color I needed and I can wear them all day comfortably.

name: Kingshow Women’s Globalwin Waterproof Winter Boots

reviews.review_text: I live in the Pacific Northwest and our winters are very wet and very cold. I decided to splurge and finally buy myself some nice snow boots. These boots are true to size, so I bought a size 7.5 (I am either 7.5 or 8 in women's shoes, depending on the brand) and they fit me perfectly, even with my wide feet and with thick fluffy socks on. I like that these are adjustable and fit my enormous calves just fine - plus, you only need to adjust the laces once. After that, you just use the zipper to take them on and off. I bought the grey boots and they look wonderful. They actually look WAY better in person. The grey material is darker and the yellow leather is actually a tan (I saw other customer photos before purchasing so I knew what to expect). I can't wait for it to snow so that I can wear these outside! --------------------- UPDATE --------------------- Well, it finally snowed and I was able to take these boots out for a spin. My husband quickly noticed that I was "walking funny" and asked if I was okay. I had also noticed that my right ankle had started to ache. We turned around and went home and I took the boots off and inspected them more closely - turns out, the heel on the right boot isn't level! I'm attaching a photo so you can see how crooked it is. Unfortunately, I was a few days past my last day to return these boots and now I'm stuck with them. After seeing all the great reviews, I'm certain these were a one-off mistake, but I'm still bummed I spent money on faulty boots that I cannot return or exchange.
reviews.review_header: Good for people with big calves. Unfortunately, mine came with a crooked heal.

reviews.review_text: I just received these boots today and I am over the moon for them. Aside from a quick trip to the bus stop, I haven't really given them a full hike yet but they are fantastic so far and incredibly warm with full insulation. The color is fantastic and not accurate in the preview images. I've included a few images for a more accurate reference.

So these are a gift for my mama. Size 10 ½ They are one and half sizes too big for me but I wanted to post and hope the pictures help. Positives: The inside has a nice felt lining. Not thin or thick. But good. The bottoms have a soft rubber on them with good grip. The boot has good cushion when walking. Cute! Cute! cute!. Wow I'm surprised how adorable they truly are! I got the gray/white6 I was able to get these $15. Yes worth it! Even at $30 I say yes! I was unsure about the colors but nope they're great. Cons: The bottom (the part that covers the top of foot/toes) is sort like targets winter boots. It's not a hard rubber. Feels like a fake leather. I could push my finger nail into it and it would show. My target boots didn't last 2 years and started cracking. I don't know if these will do that. I hope not for the price I think their worth finding out. Not sure about deep snow with having the side zipper. Also doubt these are truly waterproof. I'll see what my mom thinks but think I'm ordering a pair for myself. These boots are I can see being good for shoveling snow, walking to school in winter, shopping, looking cute in winter. A few weeks ago I ordered the Columbia ice maiden II. In 9 ½... When I put those boots on… I feel like I'm putting something on that works good but I find really unattractive. Comparing them side by side. Update: my mom loved them. I ordered a 9 for myself.

I have only had these boots for a couple of weeks, but in that time the state was hit with a blizzard and we got more than 2' of snow overnight. These boots stayed warm and dry the entire time I was outside despite the snow being as deep as they are tall. They truly are waterproof, and seem to be holding up nicely. They look nice, aren't too bulky to be fashionable, and are really comfortable. They don't feel too clunky to wear as street shoes after you shovel snow.
reviews.review_header: Wish I Could Wear These In Bed

reviews.review_text: Boots fit as I expected them to; I can wear a thick pair of socks with them. The zipper is nice for putting on quickly. The ties in the front I thought were just decorative but are great for widening the portion on your lower leg. This is helpful if needing more room to tuck jeans into, for thick socks or if you have larger calves. The foot portion is a little stiff, I've had them three days and am trying to loosen them up. They are warm for sure. Update: they have loosened up. Good fit. They have been warm as dry when walking through snow and shoveling.
reviews.review_header: Warm boots, fit around calf is adjustable

reviews.review_text: Amazingly cute. I got them for my stepdaughter and now I want a pair! They are forgiving to large calves, so if you have bigger calves like me, don't be nervous to order, I tried them on and they're great!
Wisconsin snowfall tested and approved! My feet stayed warm and dry!

These boots are exactly as described, as well as the pictures. I normally where a size 10. According to the other reviews advice I ordered a half size up to a 10.5. They fit perfectly with a little wiggle room for my toes or some warm socks. 1 plus is that you can change the height of the boot from mid calf to almost knee length. For me I prefer the knee length. 2 negatives are that the sole of the boot is a dark turquoise color and I would prefer it to be one of the boot colors. The other negetive is that when I where it knee height the lace hoops stop at the mid calf height. And so the top flares out a little. So what I did is wrap the rest of the boot lace around my leg for more of a tighter fit. I ordered the grey and tan. The colors are exactly as pictured on Amazon and people's personal pics. All and all pretty good boot for the price. I will give update after wearing them in the Snow and slush.

name: DREAM PAIRS Women's Winter Faux Fur Lining Combat Boot

reviews.review_text: Sizing: I wear a 7 1/2 and ordered an 8, since I almost always wear thick socks with my boots. They come up a few inches below my knees, and I am 5 foot 7. The laces are fully adjustable, so if you have large calves, you can adjust them to fit. Lining: They are lined from toe to top, so they keep my feet warm. This is often a problem for me, as I have circulation issues, so my toes go numb in the winter often. The lining is soft and feels like it actually cushions my feet. Water resistance: I was hoping to find boots that were somewhat weather tough. These fit the bill. The tread is enough to walk on snow and even give some traction on ice. The other day it was pouring and I walked through melting snow but ended the day with dry feet. Comfort: I wore these for an entire week, walking around 4 miles a day and my feet were comfortable and warm the whole time. Overall: These boots are super cute, comfortable, warm, and weather tough.

I really love these boots. The fur inside is amazing. I really wish they weren't so big around the calves. I'm 5"10 and 190 pounds. My calves aren't small and I have to lace these boots up nearly as tight as they'll go to get them to fit. Makes em look kinda funny.
Love them! They were a life saver for me in Maine. Fit perfect and kept my feet warm.

I was prepared to be about as disappointed by these as I have been by other ~$20 shoes and boots on Amazon (by other brands) that feel like the heels will collapse if I take more than a few tip-toeing steps. However, these are actually INCREDIBLY comfortable, seem pretty sturdily made especially considering the price, and after a few cautious tries-on around the house I decided these felt like they bore my weight well enough to trust wearing for a day of a few small errands. I walked almost a mile and a half in these today, wearing them as they come, without the medical orthotics I've been prescribed for my messed up arches, and yet these felt really great to walk in, enough so that I didn't even notice that it added up to as much as it did. I also have incredibly sensitive tops of my feet, and I don't even have any soreness there after wearing these, which is very hard for me to find in a stiff and cozy-fit shoe like this, that isn't a padded skate shoe. I also got a compliment on them from a stranger (plus two from my own family if you count that), the very first day wearing them out! The inside lining is a fleece-y type fabric very similar to fleece-lined leggings, that is a bit much for me in anything over about 65 degrees, but I personally am very prone to overheating; they would probably be just about perfect for anyone who likes or needs a bit more warmth to their feet and lower part of the legs, or just as a good dry-cold weather shoe. I live in the PNW though so I will be giving these a good waterproofing spray treatment before wearing them out in wet weather, just to be safe. They do feel sturdy, but if you've found a $20 shoe that can truly withstand an accidental trod through a curb-depth puddle, you've slipped into an alternate dimension, and I don't want to use these to test which I might be in! I also want to emphasize that these are a very cozy fit. I did have the laces tied snug but the foot part itself was just perfect, not loose at all but I also never had any issues feeling cramped or pinched in them or having any spots that rubbed wrong, which anyone who shares my size or flat arches will know, is remarkably difficult especially in an 11. The fuzzy lining probably helps. Overall, the phrase "fits like a glove" couldn't be more accurate. To anyone who is looking to these for cosplay, I officially say go for it. I will most definitely be coming back for the brown ones in this same tall style for Katniss, as they are a PERFECT fit for hers, and when the short style is back in stock in my size, those in black for a slightly modified Chloe Price, too.
reviews.review_header: Incredibly comfortable, and they look GREAT! Held up to their first day out with no problems or pain.

reviews.review_text: I lose these boots. For this price, I did not expect the quality that I received. The material the boots are made of is very thick and seems to be water proof. The inside has that wonderful warm, fluffy fleece that adds to the comfort. However, the top of the boots did not fit me. I am a bigger girl, so this was somewhat expected (which is why I am still giving this five stars). I was going to return them but I have found a way to make it work for me. I told the tops over, as pictured. It isn't the most ideal style but they were so ridiculously comfortable and awesome that I couldn't part with them.

This is a nice looking shoe. It runs a little big, which I'm not upset about cause I can wear thick socks with them. I do wish they came in half sizes though. But they're comfy, and just in time for the cold weather coming.

I’m very pleased with these thus far! They are super warm and super comfortable. My feet LOVE these! I’m hoping they will last for a few winters (for such a low price you can only expect so much), but I’m pretty rough on my shoes, and I will be wearing these pretty much everyday. They seem pretty sturdy and well made. My expectations are very realistic and not high at this price range. So if I can get two seasons wear out of these before they’re warm out, I won’t be mad at that and might even reorder. If I can three seasons out of these I’ll be quite pleased. Any more than that, I will be extremely impressed. I likely won’t be using the little hidden pouch, but I like the idea of it. There is definitely enough room in there to fit a credit card. (Yes, I tested it out). So yeah, it’s a generous little hiding space if you need it. Anyway, I’ve only been wearing these a couple of days but they are SO comfortable and SO warm! Unless something goes wrong before the season is up, there’s a 99% chance I’d order again whenever these wear out!

reviews.review_header: these boots are great! Received them yesterday & wearing today

reviews.review_text: I like the shoes for their sturdiness, and they don't look cheap at all. Easy to put on with the zipper. Polished them with a little boot polish and they are bulletproof in rain and puddles, and they grip slick watery/icy surfaces very well. One problem that I had was that in only one of my shoes, it was a very tight fit. I am a dead-on size 10, and because I have fairly narrow feet and average calves, I thought that would be able to get away with a size 10 instead of an 11. I might be able to get away with 1-2 hours in these shoes before I get pain and numbness in my toes and arch. There is also very little padding in the bottom liner and you can feel the hard base of the shoe with every step. I think that if I had sized up, most of these problems wouldn't be so bad or might be solved with added insoles. The "tightness" of the shoe through the foot and calf area was fine, it was just the toe area that seemed to stop a bit short. It was just strange that one of my shoes was tighter in the toe area than the other shoe.
Love love love. Great find. They are comfy, easy to put on and do not hurt my feel one bit. I've had them for two months and wear them almost everyday in this nyc winter

Great boots for the price, with one to two minor issues. To start ,the packaging was very nice. They come in a sturdy box (complete with a fabric handle for easy carry) and they were wrapped in a thin mesh to prevent scuffs during transport. The box was a little too small for these boots, so they were folded over at the top. There are no permanent creases as far as I can tell, though. In terms of sizing and comfort, they're great! I wear a 8.5 or a 9 in most shoes, and the 8.5 pair I ordered fits great with a little wiggle room in case I want to double up on socks for cold weather. They are snug around my calves, as well, and they don't "flop" around my leg like the reviews have said on these and other combat-style boots. (I'm 5'5" and 145 lbs, for the sake of reference. If you have very skinny or very large ankles and calves, these boots may not be for you.) The one thing that majorly peeved me about these boots is the secret pocket. I know other reviews complained about its size, but I didn't realize that the pocket size didn't actually extend the full length of the zipper. If you look at the pictures I'll include, you'll see the zipper doesn't go all the way down; the place where it stops marks the final length of the pocket. As for pocket depth, it's fine. You could fit a few credit cards and some bills in there for emergencies, but it's hard to zip up and down; I wouldn't want to struggle with the zipper on a secret credit card pocket for too long in public, so I don't know how much I'll use it. Overall, they're a fine pair of boots, but the selling point for me of having a secret pocket didn't turn out to really be worth it. You can mostly likely find other combat boots for a similar or lower price that are built just as well.
reviews.review_header: A good pair of boots for the price, but there were small issues

reviews.review_text: I was having a hard time finding combat style boots with a low heel that I could wear to work because I stand for 12 hours. These are perfect for that. I am a true size 6 and ordered a 6.5 so I could wear thick socks with them. They are a little big and I might have been able to get away with a 6 and still wear thicker socks, but I wasn’t risking that. That being said, they’re true to size and comfortable. They could use a little more support, but I wear them for long periods of time. I like pocket design and it does only zip halfway, which isn’t a drawback for me. I really do like these, however, there’s some major flaws that need pointed out. First, the inner lining is not a faux fur as advertised. If you see in my photos, it’s more of a fleece like what most leggings are lined with, but not as soft as leggings. On a positive, they are still very warm. Second, there’s glue seeping out of the bottom sole where the stitching is in certain areas in photo 4. The last thing, on one of my boots there is a slight discoloration of a white mark as shown in my last photo. I am stuck between 3 and 4 stars because they’re cute, a good price and I wear them a lot. I had to go with 3 stars because I wasn’t expecting these flaws. Even at the good price point, I’ve bought better quality boots at the same price at TJ Maxx and Burlington. I don’t regret this purchase because the rest of the boot seems well made and I actually want to check out their other boots with the fur linings. Not sure if I got the lemon of the bunch, but they’re a $20 boot max.
reviews.review_header: Really do like these, but major flaws need pointed out

reviews.review_text: I bought these in grey after reading a lot of reviews telling me to size up. I normally wear a size 10, and my normal shoe choice is my trusty pair of converse. The good news is I absolutely adore the boots. They're gorgeous, the bottom looks like it would be quite useful with traction, the side pockets are amazing. The bad news is because I ordered a size up (size 11) I can pull my entire foot out of the boot without unlacing or unzipping the boot. But of course by the time I figured this out, the grey colour had sold out in my size and I'm stuck buying these brown ones for my trip. I recommend highly that you purchase your normal size, even with the lining, the boot will fit.

I wear 8 1/2 Wide to 9 in women's running shoes (NB, Nike) I ordered size 10 in these boots because I heard they ran really small. They are right. These fit perfectly length wise. A little roomy in the heal, but I put my plantar fasciitis insert in and now it is perfect. Boot is Quality made. Soft, like real leather...not like hard plastic. These boots have an expensive feel and look. Love them.
reviews.review_header: 8 1/2 to 9 wide running shoes = size 10 boots

name: ADUTEE Women's Leather Fully Fur Lined Classic Mid Calf Winter Boot Snow Boot

reviews.review_text: It’s a so good deal. Cheaper and higher quality than what I bought last year. It keeps my feet warm very well and the bottom uses antiskid materials. It’s pretty fast to put on and matchs most of my dresses easily. I can’t live without it.
reviews.review_header: Five Stars. Has to have one in your life.

reviews.review_text: I was really not expecting much for this price, so i was blown away by the quality. The day I recieved them the prove went up from $20- $30 so I really got lucky. They are still a bargain at $30. I would say they are at least comparable to bear paw. Super soft thick lining inside. I just wish there were more colors! LOVE these.. Buy them. You won't be disappointed.

I order these boots in black to replace an old pair of boots that were similar to these. I’m so happy I ordered these. They fit great. I ordered a size 8. I wear 7and a half normally but sized up to be safe. The 8s are a perfect fit. I got my black pair today and went a head and ordered a pair in chestnut as well. Oh and I tried them outside in the cold. They’re really warm. Good buy!
Wow these are comfy! Slip right on, no problems. I wear a 7 but bought an 8 to ensure I had room to wear two pairs of socks when it gets way below Zero come January. Great boots!
I wear a size 8 and decided to order up one size to a size 9, and it was kind of snug, and without socks. So they run kind of small.
reviews.review_header: I wear a size 8 and decided to order up ...

reviews.review_text: These are absolutely amazing. They are real suede leather boots, inside lining is very warm and the sole has a great grip. Definitely worth buying.

reviews.review_text: Fit smaller than a 9 usually does. I usually can wear an 8.5, but order 9 just in case, and they were still pretty snug. Otherwise they seem pretty sturdy and durable.
