For those who are used to the later versions of these numbers and to the beefed-up orchestration of the Broadway and video versions, this recording can offer a nice contrast. Yet in my view they have only made the rewrites and revisions that Lloyd-Webber added to the score for the rest of the productions much better. Despite my feelings, at least the aura of this recording is enough to save it from being stilted, despite the solid performances from everyone concerned. And besides, it includes extra verses that were cut for the Broadway and subsequent productions of the show, so it makes this album feel closer to the T.S. Eliot poems. It's good to see this recording in a reissue that treats it with respect. The 2 CDs come in a slimline double-disc case, packaged in a neat slipcase. The booklets are an improvement over those in the previous Polydor releases, as they have offered a better-print edition of the libretto and the production credits, including the musical numbers. However, I do admit that there isn't much of a difference in sound quality between this release and the original Polydor CD. The CDs appear to have been pressed from the original CD master rather than the better-sounding remastered version that was released in 1998. I know that if I were to recommend this West End cast recording I would recommend the 1998 remastered version, as it sounds less muffled compared to the sound on this release. Yet it would not be practical because that 1998 CD costs a whopping 65 dollars. In short, even if CATS fans covet this recording I'm sorry to say I don't covet it as much as they do. I acknowledge its strengths, but yet I know it sounds a little stilted on the whole. Even so, this recording redeems itself with its solid performance and the aura of it representing the first thoughts of Andrew Lloyd-Webber and staying close to T.S. Eliot's source material before the show was tweaked and altered for Broadway. But my first choice for a CATS recording still lies with the Broadway cast Cats: Complete Original Broadway Cast Recording (1982 Original Broadway Cast) as it's got this energy that makes the show work, without destroying its spirit and nature.
reviews.review_header: A rather weak CATS recording that has its own merits and aura

reviews.review_text: Get the 1985 Original Australian Cast instead. This very special recording is similar to the Broadway Version and the 1998 Film Version, but it's the only "complete" version, with all musical numbers, since it includes both "The Awefull Battle of the Pekes and the Pollicles" and the "Growltiger's Last Stand" (with "In Una Tepida Notte"). I should also say that Mungojerrie and Rumpleteazer sing the "new version" of their song, just like in the 1998 Movie Version. Besides, the cast is very talented, the sound quality is superior. That's the best version!!
The only version anyone should listen too. Broadway's version... well sucks ass.

I bought this to replace the old cassette version I had lying around, a soundtrack I hadn't listened to in years. It's interesting to listen to, compared with the cleaner Broadway version. Aside from lyrics and music they changed when they brought the show to the States, the musical direction has a quality that's closer to how it would sound in a live performance.
One of the original Webber productions!
I love it!! I will be lip sincing "Memories" for a talent show in a few months. I can hardly wait. So much fum

name: Black Cat Smartphone Stand

reviews.review_text: I got it as a Christmas present for my daughter. It's smaller than I expected, but still very cute. I think it's made of ceramic and it has a nice weight to it. The only problem was it arrived with the tail broken. I feel it could have been packed more securely. Aside from that, it's very cute and I ordered another one to replace it. It's adorable. I lowered my rating because the second one I ordered was also broken.
reviews.review_header: I think it's made of ceramic and it has a nice weight to it

reviews.review_text: I was worried because of the reviews describing the poor packaging. And that's no joke. It's REALLY bad packaging. Miraculously mine arrived with only a minor scratch. The picture I added looks worse than it really is, but the stand could have been seriously broken. The product was placed in a regular envelope pouch with no padding. The item itself came in a flimsy plastic box. The box lid didn't have any kind of a seal on it and it popped open during shipping. The phone stand was rolling around in the package when I picked it up. Having looked it over, the phone stand is simple which I like, but mine had a minor paint defect where the whisker was painted outside the grove. The feet are un-padded. Don't place it on easily scratch-able surfaces unless you add felt feet. And as I said, the product has a scratch on the butt. I would have priced the stand at $10. It's not completely worth the $16, but I couldn't find any other cat stands I liked sooooo- >_>; The item itself is super cute. The simple design looks good. It's decently weighted, but don't get crazy. The cradle part seems thin, but this isn't a problem because it is lined with a small piece of felt/ faux-velvet to add a little more grip. I've added pictures of my Galaxy 7 sitting vertical and horizontal in the cradle. (Please excuse the awkward infini-mirror. My phone is my only camera, so I had to get creative.)
reviews.review_header: Poorly packaged, semi-over priced, but cute and good for holding the phone

reviews.review_text: Tail and right paw broken off when it arrived. I have super-glued back together, but it doesn't look like it would survive a bump off the desk. White paint on the nose is scuffed, and the indentions for whiskers is not fully painted in. Disappointed in quality for cost.

This cute phone holder is the just the right size to hold my iPhone 7plus. The back of the cat is cushioned and provides enough friction to prevent the phone from slippering. My only complain is the front paw of the cat broke during shipment. It was an easy fix with some super glue.

I received the item with a broken tail. Perhaps the shipment should have said "handle with care." The broken piece set neatly & fit between the cats legs in the front as if packer actually put it in the box that way. I'm a traveling nurse and had no time to return the item. Not happy... Unfortunately I got an error message that I had to select a star rating as I did not want to. Takes to much time and effort to send stuff back.

Got this for my desk at work however having my phone on vibrate in this little guy makes it 10x as loud since it's made of a hard material instead of rubber, as I thought, for some reason. So I can't use this at work because despite being in cubicle land my office is pretty quiet.
reviews.review_header: Makes the phone vibration way too loud

reviews.review_text: So cute!! (Pictured holding iPhone 7 Plus)
The Cat is Green, not cream. Never have seen a green cat before. It had a damaged ear. I don't recommend this.

name: Go Pet Club Cat Tree Furniture 62 in. High

reviews.review_text: I have two relatively large cats (~12lbs each) that love this thing. Reading some other reviews, I was worried that they were too big (and would ultimately not use it). One of my cats spends a lot of time in the basket. It is a little snug but she seems to enjoy being cradled. The hammock and hide-out space on the second level are not useful as they fit small kittens best. However, my cats really enjoy the other spaces and hanging out here. I set this up alone and it took about 30 minutes. I have been using this for over 1 year without any problems. *UPDATE* I will have had this for 3 years this coming December. The bottom tiers are still going strong, but as some other reviewers have mentioned the top perch is now broken and the stairs have detached. I'm leaving this as 5 stars still, though, because for $70 it lasted quite a while for my cats. Please rate this review as "helpful" if it helped you! Thanks
reviews.review_header: Nice space for small and large cats

reviews.review_text: My husband and I put this together for our fur babies in 15-20 minutes. We left the cylinder tunnel off and to the side because the baby of the 4 loves to roll around in it. It's very durable. We have adult 3 cats ranging from 12-14 lbs and 1 young adult cat that's 8 lbs. All 4 of them are on it at the same time frequently and it hasn't broken or tipped over. The heaviest fell off while rolling in catnip and it withheld him freaking out and hanging on for his life, so I don't think it'll fall anytime soon. The little bowl that hangs out on the side holds the heaviest cat with ease as well. My only complaint is that the hammock falls off easily, but it's to be expected with the hooks it comes with. If I remember, I will follow up in 3 months to add how it's handled my crazy fur babies. *UPDATE* So, I remembered! About 1.5 months into excessive use, the top tier became too lose and no amount of screwing it in would make it stay. We even tried some glue, but it was too wobbly. I ended up using the wood Gorilla Glue to keep it together and it holds up well without a screw. My littlest cat loves the bowl and has torn up the rope. He managed to unbraid it. My eldest cat would only scratch the front post and he scratched it into oblivion, so I turned over the tower and switched it with another poll to let him keep scratching. Last, we ended up switching the hammock because they love to play through the hole in the middle tier. Overall, I still say I definitely got my money's worth. It's used daily by 4 cats and to be completely honest, I didn't expect to last this long. **December 2016 Update** Besides everything I've mentioned, I wanted to share how I revamped the tower. I'm in the process of replacing all the rope posts with some rope I bought off here. Despite being in the middle of a DIY project, I wanted to share how it looks and my cats are in love with it. The only reason why I'm putting so much effort into keeping this tower is that my husband's baby is in love with the bowl, so I can't take it away from him. Lol Oh yeah. I bought a bed to go on the top since the perch was long gone. Turns out that it was a good idea. :) I hope my extensive review helped and gave ideas to all those who've read! Here's the rope that I bought to redo the scratching posts: T.W . Evans Cordage 23-410 3/8-Inch by 100-Feet Twisted Sisal Rope https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00DKA3OGO/ref=cm_sw_r_cp_apa_BTdvyb4Z4Y984 I just used a hot glue gun and did 2 rows glue, 2 rows wrapped tight without glue, then just kept alternating. You'll need to buy 2 if you're wanting to completely redo the bottom.

Assembly was pretty easy and feels sturdy enough for my 8 lb cat. The little hanging basket thing is probably only big enough for a kitten, but everyone knows the "if i [barely] fits, I sits" rule. There is a screw that may be compromising some reviewers' trees, making them unsteady or loose after some wear and tear. It's a double ended screw and some people may not be distributing its threads equally between posts (because it is possible to keep screwing it past it's designated point). If you screw the post in without holding the screw in place, it will keep screwing further into the initial (wrong) post leaving very little support for the post you are trying to attach. Overall this cat tree is very sturdy if built correctly and my cat loves it. Would highly recommend. If you found this review helpful, rate it helpful. It would be much appreciated!
reviews.review_header: FOLLOW THIS ONE ASSEMBLY INSTRUCTION AND YOU WILL BE HAPPY! :)

reviews.review_text: SERIOUS SAFETY PROBLEM. I have never write any comments before, but I have to for this one. This product definitely has some design flaws that can bring terrible potential danger to your cat. The hammock part at the bottom is held by only four little hooks that have no protection units for hiding the protruding part, and the hammock can fall off so easily. Today, the hammock fell off easily again while my cat was playing on the tree, and all of the sudden, I found her struggling there because her eyelid got hooked by the hook!!! I rescued her off hook and she was literally bleeding!! It was so lucky that I happen to be at home, or else I can't image what would happen if she was home alone and tried to get out of hook by herself. IT WOULD MADE HER BLIND!! So please double think about it before you purchase this product.
reviews.review_header: This product definitely has some design flaws that can bring terrible potential danger to your cat

reviews.review_text: I hate writing critical reviews, but I'd rather post an honest review so that others can make an informed decision. This product had a myriad of great reviews so I decided to try it out. Upon opening the box the first thing I noticed was that the fabric used to cover the tree is very low quality - It reminds me of the material used to make stuffed animals. It's very soft and feels very thin. The second thing I noticed is that the the little "cubby" on the 2nd platform is VERY small. I truly believe that only a kitten or very very small car would be able to use this. During assembly, I noticed that the screws/bolts were never able to get actually tight - they seemed to just keep spinning, and never get snug. Due to this, when my cat is on one top platforms it is. Very wobbly and unstable. Despite my initial thoughts, we decided to keep it for a week or two since it was already put together. We quickly found that the material used to cover it began to shed and leave little brown fuzzies everywhere! I was a little disappointed with this item, and will continue my search for a cat tree.

Only a cat could have written this treasury of cat-think. Poetry and prose certain to entertain and amuse every cat lover. Even the human ones. The book is a small hard-cover that fits on a table without taking up a lot of space. Easily knocked to the floor. Repeatedly. Type is large enough for a geezer (like my person) to enjoy even in less-than-adequate light. Cat portraits showing our furry brethren in cute and/or compromising poses illustrate the pages. While reading the poetry I keep saying, "Just like Mystery" or "Just like Sparx" or "Just like Pogo", etc. I enjoyed it very much and trust that everyone will. 2 dewclaws up!
reviews.review_header: Purrfect for the cat-lover you love

reviews.review_text: Mr. Marciuliano, Catzilla would like to have a word with you. See that "Say What? You're kidding me!" look on his face in this picture? He wants to talk to you about your poem, "One Day." He says, "you may be funny, and you may know a few things about cats, but let me tell you. You are right that we are not equal, but every feline knows who's really in command, and we don't need to wear the pair of your slacks we just peed on to prove it. And seeing as we can reduce you silly humans to a pile of gibberish with a nonstop flood of puddles or aromatic piles, the people who feed us will *never* be our equals, and we cats know who's really in command here." So, Catzilla's comments aside, because yah, he totally wears the Emperor's hat in this house, and should we ever doubt it, he sends his sidekick, Sith Whispicus out to reinforce his demands...this is a funny book, if you've ever had a cat with a touch of the spiteful in him. Cough *Catzilla*. And mostly, I think the author gets it right. I bought this book for my daughter, but I did some reading myself when it came in today because when I had looked at the on-line preview, it made me laugh. And I always like a good laugh. I do have to say though, my favorite cat humor book remains "A Cat's Night Before Christmas," by Beard/Jones/Boswell. It used to leave me gasping for air every time I read it, until it became my daughter's favorite book as a toddler. And we read it over, and over, and over because that's what toddler's do. And being able to quote it from memory allows me to breath when it's read, but I can still smile when thinking about it. So that's a good one to try too, and very on point if you're a cat owner. But otherwise, I thought this one was funny in a more artsy kind of way, and I know my daughter is going to love reading it as well.

Just received "I Could Pee on This: And Other Poems by Cats" today and have already finished it, wiping the tears of laughter as I went along. This is the perfect gift for the cat lover in your life, although it isn't necessary to be one to find the book thoroughly delightful and laugh-out-loud funny. Kudos to Francesco Marciuliano and his brilliant wit. He has a fan for life!
reviews.review_header: No need to be a cat lover to thoroughly enjoy this one!

reviews.review_text: This is a cute book, and enjoyable. Love the photos, and most of the poems. Though some are a bit of a stretch, it's all in good fun. I recommend this to all my cat-loving friends as a pleasurable half hour or so. I'm going to get this in the printed version for my son and his kids, cat-lovers all.
reviews.review_header: A goofy, guilty pleasure worth the time and the money

reviews.review_text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for a friend who's a super cat lady. I love cats also and thought I'd read it before storing it away for Christmas. The poetry is so very boring. I read about 1/3 of the way through so far and am very disappointed that I spent my money on it. I'll still give it to her, perhaps she'll like it better than I. The pictures are really cute, though it's very hard for a kitten/cat pic to not be cute and that is the 1 star rating. I wouldn't recommend this book at all.

The silent war between cats and humans has been going on for thousands of years. The key reason it continues is because we don't know enough to surrender. In part this is due to cats' cleverness. They have kept the battles at such a low level, we don't know the war is going on. It rages silently, below our radar. The author of "I Could Pee on This" is breaking the news to those who have been ignorant in their bliss. The cats have won. They are in charge. You don't believe it? Well, who's the one cleaning the litter box? Francesco Marciuliano knows cats. From feline typewriter fixation to toilet paper destruction to shattered wineglasses, the man has suffered––as have we all––at the paws of cats. And for the love of the diabolical little suckers, he––as do all we cat captives––keeps coming back for more. See "This Is My Chair" for your Cat's attitude towards property rights, "Busy, Busy" for cat sleeping habits. "I Run" reveals a cat's intense desire to appear to know what he's doing. "Tripped" and "Talk to Me" reveal your cat's devious nature and possible criminal intent. In "Kneal (sic) before Me" the true nature of Cat/human relations is revealed. "Nudge" has been my own personal experience with five cats over 60 years, so that one is absolutely dead-on right. Blush at "Man's Best Friend" because it's probably true. "Family" is very likely true––you aren't that important. Every cat is the center of his own universe. You are just a satellite. "I Lick Your Nose" is so true that I've bought thicker makeup to cover scratch scars from the cat who repositions me to suit his favored sleeping spots during the night. This is done by digging into my cheek or eye socket and pulling. When accomplished during REM sleep, I don't discover Rowdy's act of violence until I wash my face in the morning. And, of course, the title piece says it all: Your cat will dominate you at every turn. I laughed all the way through "I Could Pee on This," often reading pertinent verses to my husband as we lay in the dark, me reading my Kindle, he drifting off to sleep. He didn't always react as I would have hoped. I'm hoping it was because he was half-asleep. I've converted him to being a cat person. But does the dog person in him still prevail? Rowdy, Jeep, Liam, Smokey and I must get together and work on him. If forty-two years of cat domination haven't quite converted him yet, we'll have to take more drastic action.... KL
reviews.review_header: In the war between cats and humans, the cats have prevailed

name: IAMS PROACTIVE HEALTH Adult Healthy Digestion Dry Cat Food with Chicken and Turkey, 16 lb. Bag

reviews.review_text: Have used now for two weeks. Two cats, one has been a chronic regurgitator..I've tried everything for the past two years. Problem was lessened with high dollar foods and slow feeders, but still upchucking once every other day. Switched to this, and no more problems! Still using slow feeder. Second cat just went nuts over this food! Both love it!! I am SOOOOO relieved to no longer have to clean my carpets constantly!

My cats suddenly started vomiting alot from their Purina Cat Chow food. I wasnt sure if it was the food that was causing it or if they had both gotten into something. I decided to go ahead and buy them a gentler cat food. I purchased the Iams Sensitive Stomach and literally the next day, no more vomit. They have been on this stuff ever since. This is hard to find, and I am so glad that Amazon has it. You cant find the bigger bags in the stores around where I live. This bag lasts quite a while. I would highly suggest this brand of food.
reviews.review_header: and I am so glad that Amazon has it

reviews.review_text: If your kitty has any digestive issues, or certain foods make it's tummy sick, this is great cat food to remedy that. I have two cats, and noticed that around age 5 they developed sensitive tummies. I'm sure a lot of this has to do with bad stuff being in their food, like GMO's and certain meal products not meant for cats, but after switching to this I've had very minimal problems with coming home to little surprises on the floor all the time. Consult with your vet of course, but my cats love this and I couldn't be happier with the results I've had from it.
reviews.review_header: Great for kitties with weak stomachs

reviews.review_text: Thank you IAMS! I have tried several different brands of cat food to help my two cats with their digestive problems - no luck until I tried this one! Hallelujah! It has been days now since any cat digestive problems with their mess on my floors. I also use IAMS hairball treatment - my cats love this as well. I also appreciate the size of the food pieces - not too large now too small (my one cat would swallow small pieces whole and then have a problem). My two cats would soil the floor with their digestive issues daily before I tried this product. Thank you, again, IAMS!
reviews.review_header: I also use IAMS hairball treatment - my cats love this as well

reviews.review_text: My now seven-month-old kitten and my cat have both had very loose bowel for the past four months and have been having accidents in our home on our lovely carpet. I switched to this brand and this exact type of cat food and All of our problems are gone. Thank you Iam’s
reviews.review_header: Best food for animals with digestive issues, sensitive stomachs, loose stools and so much more. This stuff is the best

reviews.review_text: Out of four indoor cats who grace my home, two of them have a problem with vomiting a little too frequently. They're healthy, but often eat too much at one time and it all comes back up. I chose IAMS Proactive Health Specialized dry cat food for Healthy Digestion. This dry cat food has really cut back on the vomiting problem. The cats like it and they chew the pieces up rather than swallowing it whole as they do with some other foods.
reviews.review_header: Works for my cats' delicate tummies

reviews.review_text: My cat used to vomit daily before I started feeding her this cat food- this started out of the blue when she was about 5 or so. This food solved the problem immediately, and my cat is much happier now that she is feeling better. Worth a try if you have a cat with a sensitive stomach, and the price here is good- it is hard to find in stores. I've purchased this at Target for a higher price.
reviews.review_header: and my cat is much happier now that she is feeling better

reviews.review_text: I have an elderly cat (19 yrs old) and she began throwing up her dry food. The Proactive Healthy Digestion (which used to be called Sensitive Stomach) agreed with her immediately. I called the company to make sure it was the same & was told it was just a name change. She isn't throwing up anymore and she loves her new food. Thank you for continuing the product & offering it on Amazon!

reviews.review_text: This is average food to me for my cats. Sometimes they are interested in it and sometimes not. I don't think the ingredients are as good as they should be for the name. Natural Choice by Nitro is worth the couple extra bucks!
Have two mature cats. They both love this food, even the picky cat. This price was cheaper than what I saw in store, but the bag is so small. Wish we could get a larger bag.

this food helped my cat act more mature

She is currently on the 5th book out of 6 and is talking about reading all of them. I have heard so much about the stories and she is completely hooked. Great series for an animal-loving girl.

I'm not a kid nor will I give these to a juvenile, the writing and the themes are appropriate for adults, too. Two points: there is a fair bit of violence. Some readers may feel uncomfortable with the bloodshed - I did. And the stories are addictive. Once you're a Warriors fan you will want to read all the books, not just this starter pack.
reviews.review_header: Meet the Warriors - six books of great reading!

name: Joy For All Silver Cat With White Mitts

reviews.review_text: My family recently had to place my mom in a nursing home for long term care. It was an incredibly difficult and painful decision to make. She has dementia and my 88 year old father could no longer care for her. We worried about the time she would spend there when no one was visiting or during the periods of time with no activities. Because of his, I got her a joy for all cat. She has always been a nurturer, as a mother and grandmother, and has also loved animals. I am happy to say that this was one of the best purchases I have ever made. She enjoys petting the cat and the reactions she gets from her touch. It is truly remarkable what this cat can do. It is very lifelike and although my mother knows it isn't real she enjoys it nonetheless. The nurses and CNAs are all enamoured with her cat as well! She is the most popular resident on the floor! The 'toy' appeals to all ages. My 10 year old niece spent time visiting with my mom and her cat. The interaction they shared was very special and allowed my niece an opportunity to connect with my mom. After taking my mother back to the nursing home after Thanksgiving dinner, she was reluctant to be there as we entered her room. Thank goodness for the cat, which redirected her thoughts and allowed her to settle in calmly. I am so thankful for this companion for my mom!
reviews.review_header: It was an incredibly difficult and painful decision to make

reviews.review_text: I ordered this cat for my mom, who suffers from Alzheimer's. When it arrived, I really had doubts, because the movements were loud and it was just the tiniest bit creepy. I was thinking of returning it. But, I took it to my mom and she loved it. She talked to it, petted it and loved the purring and movements she got in response.

I bought my first orange tabby cat on November 18. It was a huge hit with my 89 year old father-in-law — he has dementia, and in recent months has been pulling further into his figurative shell. He LOVES the cat. He believes it is real, talks to it, laughs with it, pets it, interacts with it. His mood has improved dramatically, and he is more alert. This cat is a FIVE STAR concept and a FIVE STAR addition to the lives of older people (& their caregivers). However, the product is ONE STAR in terms of reliability. My FIL loved it so much he broke it. We think he held the head too tightly, and ultimately the servos broke. The cat still meows and purrs, but it no longer rolls onto its back and the eyes no longer open. The heartbreaking thing is now my FIL asks the kitty why she isn't opening her eyes. Dear Hasbro Product Managers: keep it simpler. The cat doesn't need to roll onto its back for a tummy rub. The meowing, purring, and eyes/mouth movements probably solve 90% of the "real" factor, and are less prone to breaking. As a side comment, I now face a very real problem: my FIL loves this cat. There is no vet I can take it to. Instead, I've bought a replacement cat. Yes, you read that right, I've bought 2 $100 robo-cats in less than one month because this kitty is bringing very real joy to my FIL, and some much needed relief to his round-the-clock caregivers. The value per hour is astronomical, and this cat pays for itself many times over. That said, Hasbro would be wise to figure out how they're going to handle replacements/repairs/breakage. At any rate, I look forward to further improvements in this product line. And hopefully I won't have to buy a baker's dozen before we get there...
reviews.review_header: Five stars for concept, 1 star for reliability.

reviews.review_text: I bought this for my 94 year old grandmother to keep her company after remembering that she grew up with cats. I was a bit skeptical, having two (real) cats of my own, but decided to give it a shot. FAMILY RATINGS: - Grandma (4 stars): It took her a couple of hours to get used to it (she's not at all tech savvy and a moving toy freaked her out), but it's been a couple of weeks and "Kitty" (creative, I know) is still hanging out with her. Like one of the previous reviews also mentioned, she is well aware that it's not a real cat, but she plays and talks with it almost as if it were real. - Mom (4 stars): She thinks it's cute and enjoys playing with it... possibly a little more than my grandma since she better understands the logic behind its movements. - Me (2.5 stars): If I had purchased this for myself, I would have returned it (Reminder: I have 2 real, live cats to cuddle with at my leisure so this machine just doesn't compare). But, as a gift for my grandmother, it's really comforting to know that she has something nice to interact with when no one else is home. - My cats (see video - haha) PROS: - Fur is soft, almost life-like - Meowing sounds are cute, though slightly comical - Purring sound and vibrations are surprisingly nice - No need for food, water, poop scooping... or band aids :) CONS: - Whirring sounds during movements are really audible (you'll never forget it's a machine) - Occasional spastic movements with annoyingly loud clicking - As mentioned in one of the first comments, there is a bit of Satan in this cat. Just don't let its "sigh" catch you off guard in a dimly lit room while you're alone. It still creeps me out. OTHER COMMENTS: - I wish there was a better range of movement (i.e. when it "rolls back") and had more padding to make the toy feel more realistic - The toy's sensors are light activated. If there isn't a source of light coming from your direction, the cat won't notice your movement and react accordingly.

name: S.Leaf Cat Stud Earrings Freshwater Cultured Pearl Stud Earrings Sterling Silver Ear Studs

reviews.review_text: I love everything about this earring, from the lovely details in the tiffany's blue package to the perfectly shaped​ round pearls and the cute tiny rose gold earring. They also brought extra closure and a silver polishing cloth. There is a stamping in both the earrings and the closure​ for S925. This is a nice modern twist the traditional pearl earrings. especially if you're a cat person you would appreciate this. This would make a great gift!

I love it! Pearl earrings are a go to for my conservative work wardrobe, but can be a bit plain. The silver cat ears are a nice addition to pearls; simple and tasteful. The box contained: a pair of silver sterling stoppers, seven rubber stoppers, a polishing cloth, and a sweet thank you card with cleaning tips (Happy New Years guys!) I wore the earrings with the silver sterling stoppers the whole day and had no skin irritation. The pearls feel firmly held in the ear-stud findings. The pearls also have a nice clean luster (added pictures for reference). Overall very satisfied and considering buying the baroque metallic pearls next time.

These are adorable. The pearl is firmly attached to the ear and post part. I think that the pearls are out of proportion to the ears. They are too big. I have to wear the earring backs that are quite wide [shaped like a disk and didn't come with the earrings] ] to keep them from 'looking down.' But they are so cute. I'm going to buy a few more pairs and tuck them away for gift giving. The box, backs and polishing cloth provided are very nice touches. I know pearls can't be cleaned with jewelry cleaner so the cloth will enable spiffing the earrings up without ruining the pearls. I think anyone with a sense of fun will enjoy these kittycats.

These are nice quality pearl earrings with a sweet and subtle humorous nod to cat lovers. The packaging impressed me as much as the earrings themselves! A little thank you note was enclosed with some "extras"......jewelry care suggestions, a cleaning cloth, and multiple earring post backers! These extra touches speak volumes about the creator and seller of this lovely product. My only regret is that Amazon's rating is limited to 5 stars.

I needed a pair of earrings to go with my pearls. These earrings are beautiful. I put them together with my pearls and then attended my father's funeral. That was so very sad but my pearls looked good. The reason this is important to me is because I didn't want to look at anything but my best when saying goodbye to my father.

The packaging for these earrings was beautiful! Came in a box on a velvet pillow wrapped in plastic and a thank you card and polishing cloth. The pearls are a good size and i love the fact that the ears are rose gold. Very in-style color and matches my rose gold apple watch. definitely worth the price!
reviews.review_header: The packaging for these earrings was beautiful! Came in a box on a velvet pillow ...

reviews.review_text: I bought these as a stocking stuffer for a cat lover in my life, and she loved them. The ears are just the right size - subtle, yet prominent to be recognizable as cat ears. The gold pearls looked great, although I would describe them as a dark cream or an off white rather than gold.

These earrings are too adorable for words! My daughter LOVES them. They are a little larger than I thought they would be (more of an adult size), so I think these are best for slightly older girls 8/9+. The stud is also a bit long for children, but it comes with plastic backings so it won't poke. Very well made. I have no doubt my daughter will enjoy these for years to come.

name: GANSSIA Colorful Cats Design 0.38mm Gel Pens Black Ink Pack of 6 Pcs

reviews.review_text: I love these pens! They are so cute and write very well. They are fine super fine tip (.38 mm) gel pens. I've had problems in the past with gel pens either letting out too much ink or not enough, but I find the consistency to be always just right with these pens. The only time the pens will skip is if I've left the cap off for awhile without using the pen and try to immediately use it again. So make sure you keep the caps on! The barrel also has a really nice matte texture that keeps the pen from slipping in your hands. Before buying these, I saw several different designs listed besides just cats, but I can't find them now. If I ever come across them again, I would love to buy some of the other designs!
reviews.review_header: Cute and functional slim point gel pens

reviews.review_text: These pens write really well, are superfine, and pretty adorable. I didn't think I would like them so much and was worried they would smear really bad (I'm left-handed), but they don't. The caps stay on nice and tight, easy to stick on the end of the pen while you're using it and they don't fall off. My only recommendation would be to go EASY on the pens until you find the right grip and pressure for writing. The metal tips are very fine, so you want to be careful when writing as you can put indentation on your paper, or might even bend the tip. I also bought another set which the same review has been left for because they're from the same manufacturer and again, really great quality. Now I just have to make sure people don't steal them from my desk...

These pens are super cute and I was very impressed with how well the ink flows out of them. I took them to work and have gotten so many compliments on them. Everybody knows which pens are mine since I am the resident cat lady and lover of all cute things in the office. I always smile when I see their little faces looking out at me from their pen holder. It's like their saying come play with us and write wonderful messages. I couldn't be happier with these little guys.

I love these pens so much. They write thinly but the ink is almost always consistent. It does help if you store them upside down despite wanting to show off the adorable kitty caps! The only problem that I've had with them is that I like to use them for schoolwork and the ink tends to streak unless you wait quite a while for the page to settle. My highlighters may be in a dire state of streakiness but these pens are almost completely worth it. I've only had a few tracking issues with the ink where I had to go over some notes with a different pen but for the most part they work wonderfully and are just too cute!

These are honestly my favorite pens for when I study Japanese. They write so smooth, which in turn makes me feel better (for some reason) while I'm learning. The cats are cute and the colors on the bottom of the pens are pastel which match the theme. The bag these come in is super cute and they put a note into the bag thanking you for your purchase and they leave contact info in case you have any issues with the product. Overall I'm very happy with this purchase and I'm totally going to buy these again when the time comes.

I am picky with pens... I like them to have that thick, smooth feel to them. These are the complete opposite of what I tend to like. They have that scratchy feel to them, but they still somehow write so smoothly. I have never written with a quill, but for some reason, I feel like I am with these pens. Ink flow and deposit is great! The pens are sooooo cute with the little cats. I love them! I plan on buying one of the other packs soon! That’s how much I like them!

These are really cute pens and I absolutely love the super fine tip. I'm a fan of the scratchy fine tip feel against the paper. I would give them a 5 except that one of them is a little damaged on the end like the plastic tube wasn't cut properly and the little end cap rattles a little. It functions just fine, just a bit of cosmetic imperfection. Overall a really good adorable buy.

These pens are so cute, but they smear like crazy. Definitely not good for writing extensive notes or drawing. They take at least 5 to 10 minutes to dry, which is pretty absurd for everyday pens. Other than that, they flow great and I have gotten so many compliments on them. I still think these are great for the price and are really nice pens.
reviews.review_header: Beautiful Pens, But Smear too Easily!

name: It's not really drinking alone if the cat is home stemless wine glass, 15 oz.(cat) - Laser Etched

reviews.review_text: I ordered three of these, two of the cat and one of the dog versions. All arrived safely, very cleverly packed using expandable foam. The glasses are very clear, not cheap greenish glass, thicker than a typical high-end wine glass, but the added thickness should make them less likely to chip or break if knocked against some other object. The laser etching is a bit faint, and it doesn't compare to old-school mechanical engraving, but it's flawless and attractively designed. Of course, it won't wear off in the dishwasher, like glasses with enameled artwork. These are huge glasses, which might be too big for small hands. They hold about 14 ounces, which is nearly three standard 5-ounce servings of wine! So, beware when filling, unless your objective is to get blotto in a hurry. They are approximately the same size and shape as the "NOTMOG" (not made of glass) plastic wine glasses I bought a couple of years ago, but the real glass feels better in the hand. See: https://smile.amazon.com/gp/product/B01A7UB3RQ for details. I think it would be great if this seller offered the same laser-etched designs on the NOTMOG plastic, for safe outdoor / patio use. I've included a couple of example photos of what happens after drinking an entire glass of wine.
reviews.review_header: A great gift for the "crazy cat people" in your life

reviews.review_text: Got this as a birthday gift for a friend and she loved it! It's good quality and not thin glass like some wine glasses. The etching is clear and not smudgy. Great for any cat/wine lover.

name: Umiwe Cute Kitty LED Children Night Light Kids Silicone Cat Lamp 8 Single Colors and 7-Color Flashing USB Rechargeable Lighting, Warm White Light

reviews.review_text: If you don't like the rapid changing colors: 1. Turn it on, and tap it to get it to the color-changing mode 2. While in this mode, push the power button. This will turn the cat white 3. Tap the cat, and it will switch to a color. You'll notice that, this time, it stays on one color. 4. Tap it as many times as you want, to select the color you want! His ears were pushed in when I opened the box, but I gave it a little squeeze, and popped them into shape. It deflated a little bit of his air, but he quickly popped back into normal shape
reviews.review_header: If you're confused on how to get it to stay one color...

reviews.review_text: This would be a five star review but for one thing: the lights don't really 'breathe' in that the cycling is not a gradual fade in/out of colors - it's just a rapid switch between them. I bought it as a night light for a 6 month old who likes it just fine, but it isn't as soothing as the fading style would be. If some of the other ones being sold offered that feature I would have chosen one of the others, but I suspect they all come from the same manufacturer, so I think this is just what you get regardless. The soft white nightlight function is perfectly fine and it is a good amount of soothing light - not too much, not too dim. The silicone is quite soft; it doesn't hold up against touch easily. This shouldn't be a problem if it's a stationary nightlight, of course, but a consideration if this might be something you'd be using for a child who wants something to carry along to the bathroom. It should be sturdy enough, but I'm not sure how well it would survive being dropped, etc. What's nice about this is that, obviously, it's seriously adorable. It's also bigger than I expected; I didn't read the product description regarding height because I didn't really care one way or another; just wanted a nightlight like this. It's actually about six inches tall and pretty wide, so it puts off plenty of nice, soft light.
reviews.review_header: Good size, perfect light levels - good buy for the money.

reviews.review_text: This little cat light is adorable. It is rechargeable. You can turn it on with normal white light and leave it on for light all night. Or if you gently tap the cat he will rotate from white, to a rainbow cycle then off. The rainbow cycle rotates for a couple minutes and then goes off. Unfortunately, you can not stop the light on any on particular color. I keep this beside my bed at night and if I have to get up and need some extra light I just tap it on the head. The material is rubbery and flexible so it is durable and can withstand being dropped.
I love this light. I'm a 25 year old guy with 2 cats and this light make me feel safe while i use the bathroom in the middle of the night. The soft light is soothing to my psyche.

Got it for my girlfriend and she absolutely loves it. I'll walk into the bedroom some nights and she's already passed out with the cat glowing different colors. It's not lying about the long battery life either, that things takes forever to die. Great purchase and great product!

This is an excellent night light for children. It lights up beautiful colors and it is so soft my 5 year old hugs it while she falls asleep. Great product! So nice I am going to buy a second one for my 2 year old. I have bought many night lights for my little ones but none can compare to this one.

I bought rhis for my 3yr old. It does exactly what it says. She really loves it. It is sort of a pain that you have to plug it in to charge (I kniw zi'm not along when I say that I already have a million ither things to plug in), however she loves leaving it on all the time so it would be awful to have to replace batteries too. The light part falls out fairly often, but it just pops right back in. I bought it for a toddler and she tosses it all over the place and it's still going.

Adorable little night-light lamp. I love that it doesn't need to be plugged in all the time (therefore reducing the risk that toddlers will be playing with or near an outlet) and that the battery is rechargeable! Brilliant design and very easy to use. Our toddler was running around hugging it all night the first night. The only drawback I could see is that the light is too bright to be used as an all-night night light. It's more of winding-down night light for getting settled in bed. The light is too bright to sleep next to.
reviews.review_header: Cute, Practical, Functional - a great combo!

reviews.review_text: Bought this for my mother for Mother's Day, she loves cat and hates lawn gnomes so it was a perfect gift for her! It arrived as scheduled in great condition. Oh and an added bonus, they reached out to me on a personal note (as I'm sure they do to most of their customers) asking how I was enjoying the product. Just goes to show what level of customer service they provide! I'm sure if I had an issue with the product they wouldn't think twice about helping to resolve it!

GARDEN GNOME STATUE - Cat massacre - funny Gnomes sculpture figurines Art Décor - Best Indoor outdoor for Patio Yard Lawn House or door - Unique New Design, Makes a perfect gift This statue is so cute! It is well made, colors are bright and vibrant and the gnomes being "attacked" by the cat is just adorable. I love cats, I have 4 plus one feral I take care of outside, and gnomes and was so excited when I saw this I immediately ordered it and it came within a few days and I was not disappointed one bit. If you are are a cat lover or a gnome lover this is a unique item to add to your collection or better yet give as a gift! I have not seen anything like this Kitty Gnome statue ANYWHERE it is that unique and I know I will be asked where I got it when my friends see it. You will love it just as much as I do I am sure. Look at the expression of the gnome on the bottom tangled in the tail! PURFECT! ;) ( sorry I could not resist! )

reviews.review_text: He arrived today! Got here FAST! Gorgeous, crisp colors, exactly as pictured though the pictures don't do him justice.
This is so cute must have for cat and gnome people I really love it's well made great detail

Its very cute. Don't look at it as a massacre, look at it as a very protective kitty wanting to take the gnomes home and have its very own gnome litter. The gnomes are just not used to that much "loving".

"I love her. I can hardly wait to put her outside under the pergola on the patio. Totally hysterical. I'm really glad she doesn't eat fairies. There are a few gnomes in my fairy garden. The fairies don't really like them anyway. They think the gnomes should have their own garden. =) That's why I have a cute little dragon in my fairy garden to protect the fairies from the gnomes. So they'd better behave or they will get eaten if they wander. Thank you so much for making the cat. She is right up my alley."

Was pleasantly surprised at the quality and detail. Solid enough it would take very strong wind to budge, but not too heavy. Would make a really cute gift, but I'm keeping this one! Update - I've had it on my uncovered front porch for a year, through an Illinois winter and it still looks great!

name: S.Leaf Sterling Silver Cat Necklace Cat Necklace for Woman

reviews.review_text: I love this necklace! I do not like bulky jewelry that weighs me down or is overly distracting. This is small and beautiful.

I have a strong preference for dainty jewelry and love cats! Consequently, this necklace is perfect for me. The quality and the price can't be beat! I also appreciated how well-packaged it was. It included instructions on how to prevent the necklace from tarnishing and a small polishing cloth and a sturdy box to store it in.

I didn't know what to expect when I ordered this and I must say I was so pleased. Looks just like the picture, wellmade and came on a nice chain. I do wish there was a way to get it off of the chain, but there is not unless I break the chain. The chain is .925 silver, but it has an extender on it and a spring clasp. I do not care for the look of extended chains nor spring clasp, so I would like to put it on my chain that has a lobster clasp and no extension on it. This is my only mild issue with the necklace, not big enough to change my star rating. I got it in matte versus the polished look and it looks like white gold instead of the .925 silver that it is. I get comments and compliments every time I wear it. It is worth every penny I spent on it. If you love cats, this is a perfect way to say so. I recommend this highly. I really feel like you will not be disappointed and it comes in such a nice and unique box.
reviews.review_header: Perfect for cat lovers around the world

reviews.review_text: The pendant was a bit smaller than I expected but it's super cute! Lots of complements about it too!

The necklace is adorable, I love how small the charm is. The chain is fairly cheap but adequate enough for the price. The chain was broken when I received the necklace in the mail, but customer service replied to me within 5 minutes of my message and sent me a new one. Arrived quickly and they didn't have me send back the old necklace. All in all, really cute and customer service was extremely accommodating. Worth the price.

I Love it the cats even enjoy watching.
reviews.review_header: If you love your cats watch this now

reviews.review_text: This is my all-time favorite musical. I'm a fan of T.S. Eliot literature as well, so I was hoping the Blu-ray was better quality than the DVD. Unfortunately, it's not. The sound is not consistent as with the DVD, so you have to keep adjusting the volume because you either can't hear certain parts, or they are too loud if you turn it up to hear the low parts. Also, the picture quality is not much different from DVD, or it isn't at all. If you have the DVD, no need to get the Blu-ray. If you don't have a copy at all and want one, go for whichever is cheaper, as the quality is most likely the same.

The movie is definitely not bluray quality. The words spoken are extremely hard to hear even with surround system on with volume very loud. Singing part of the play is so loud we can't listen to it. I'm not very happy with the fact the words do not match the characters mouth movements. Very dissatisfied

I love this production - it's one of my favorites! I ordered the Blu-Ray, though, and was disappointed with the quality of the recording. It almost seems like VHS quality! The menu setup is also very confusing. That being said, it does have all the advertised "extras" and it did play in my PS4, so the region issue seems not to be too much of a problem.
reviews.review_header: Bad quality recording but it delivers in quantity

reviews.review_text: This is more or less a pure entertainment musical; minimal storyline tying together mostly good musical and dance numbers. I wouldn't really try to read anything more into it than that. I had earlier gotten the 2 video version and was somewhat disappointed by the sound; you can barely hear the cast during 'The Naming of Cats' and in several spots the music overpowers the voices. Turning up the volume on your TV gives you quite a bit of static and popping instead of clarity. This seems to be from either a bad master VHS or simply how they did this version; they recorded a 90 piece orchestra (as Webber mentions most theatres use about 16 pieces), then the singers, then shot the choreography but didn't use that vocal recording. So really you're hearing 2 recordings dubbed onto the dancing and in spots it really shows. On the DVD however the sound is much better. Most of the songs are very clear ('Naming of Cats' is still very low)and only in a few spots do you notice sound effects that got forgotten from video to DVD. The picture is slightly better as well but the improved sound is the real reason to get DVD over VHS. The major addition to the bonus features is about 7 ten minute or so interveiws with the original production staff; it makes a nice contrast to how the show is now and what it went through to even be shown as a musical. My only major complaint about the DVD is the very flimsy case; basically it is a tri-folded plastic sheet with 2 thin DVD/CD rounds and a small booklet. As a final thought all you married men out there probably shouldn't pay too close attention to the dancing during the 'Macavity' number.

Video transfer is the pits. Absolutely incredible that they even bothered to put an atrocious video transfer such as this onto a Blu-ray disc. Ridiculous! Item was delivered quickly, though and in good condition.

I fell in love with Cats after having been dragged to it by my wife many years ago. The seats were great and it was a wonderful experience. Having seen the play twice more I was excited to learn it was now available on video. Bottom line is it's a great addition to any collection. Partridge is delightful as he chews up the scenery as Rum Tug Tugger in a much more narcisistic, and to my mind appropriate portrayal of the character than I had seen before. Sir John Mills was a treat as Old Gus, and frankly I think the elimination of the Growltigger sequence did nothing but improve the play. I would have paid the price of a play ticket for the video just to have the opportunity to watch it whenever I needed my Cats 'fix'. Although it doesn't give you the opportunity to take your eyes away from the action and look at the subtext on other parts of the stage, it does show the interaction of the cats on screen in a much more intimate context. I think the trade off is worth it to see the performance in this new way.
reviews.review_header: To watch over and over again

reviews.review_text: Love Cats the Musical. Not the best HD I was hoping for, but still very well done.

The video quality is an up conversion of SD quality. I knew this when purchasing so was not as disappointed as I would have been if I had no idea. Still worth the purchase of the blu-ray though to have this in anamorphic widescreen (the DVD is letterbox but not formatted for widescreen TVs). If you're looking for the best available release of CATS, this is it.
reviews.review_header: I knew this when purchasing so was not as disappointed as I would have been if I had no ...

name: 5 Pairs Women's Cute Animals Socks for Girls Funny Funky Novelty Gift

reviews.review_text: I can’t speak to their durability because these are going to be a gift so I’m not opening them but they are super cute in person. Come in a zipper plastic bag and each sock is individually paper collared so they could be separated as stocking stuffers or something. I’m very pleased.
Five colors of cat socks, all the colors come as pictured. Perfect for small gifts, especially Easter baskets!

My wife loved them! But they developed holes fairly quickly. My wife never goes without shoes or flip flops and maybe uses them once a week. And in 3 ish months all the pairs have little holes. Still usable but I don’t know for how long

The totoro socks are just about the cutest things ever! Putting the totoro on the heel is a clever bit of design, because then your heel fills out his big belly. I've come to really like this type of sock for its snug fit -- they never ride down at the heel like so many other socks do -- and they soften up nicely in the wash. They're also astonishingly inexpensive and come in a huge variety of adorable patterns.

We :), yes WE love these socks my mom wears tgem, my daughter and so do I. They've cute, but most importantly, good quality & very comfortable - the heel doesn't ride up, and the elastic around ankle is very soft, doesn't leave a a mark. I recommend them.

My daughter loved her kitty cat socks . They washed well ... she wears them a lot ! I would definitely buy more ... thinking of getting some as Christmas gifts our family loves cats. A great buy, very happy with purchase.
reviews.review_header: My daughter loved her kitty cat socks

reviews.review_text: These are thin, stretchy and comfy sox. soft material, smooth.. For ladies size 7 (and down to kids size 2) very nicely and appear to have room. I would not expect to fit a size 9 or 10 as well, tho. Colors are nice, rich and not "bright" or obnoxious. Buy!
really cute design, a bit thicker than dress socks but comfy enough. however one out of the 5 pairs is defective, it has a big hole near the ankle seam.

This is a heartwarming story of a tiny Japanese island that has been working to get back on its feet since the 2013 earthquake and tsunami. It shows the kitty cat inhabitants and pets, as well as, the many people who have called the island home. I hope the documentary creates a great little tourist industry for the island with such sweet people and their feline friends. It reminded me of slow island time in Hawaii though it is far off in Japan. I hope someone adds it to IMDB too.

This is such a beautiful and well shot documentary! I adore cats so of course I was interested when I saw this documentary available. But it is about so much more than just cats. It is so rich and full of the culture of this particular Japanese island. This documentary is so touching and so incredibly beautiful!!

A beautiful little doc about a somewhat isolated island human culture, living now alongside and intermixed with a culture of cats, respected greatly by the people there. Very peaceful and unique place, I hope it somehow survives and is preserved despite the dwindling nearly completely elderly population.
Thank you for showing us an unseen place in the world. Loved it!
reviews.review_header: Always nice to see new places around the world

reviews.review_text: Well done and enjoyable documentary about this island and their way of moving and taking care of and helping each other and all of their cat inhabitants. Made me smile to watch, and looks like a beautiful place.
reviews.review_header: and looks like a beautiful place

reviews.review_text: so many people smiling... its contagious
Amazing

As a cat lover, knowing in nature out in the world on a small fishing village lives hundreds of cats surviving in the harsh winter winds and fending off crows. Manga Island is a place I have put down as a wish list to see, and it touches your heart t see how the elderly villagers come together.

less than 3 minutes... Fantastic way to apply from mobile device. Thank you amazon !!!

reviews.review_text: While the imagery wasn't bad the narrator was irritating. She spoke way to fast and did not modulate her voice at all; which ended up being boring even though she was providing good information. I couldn't continue it. If she plans on continuing in this field she really needs to take some lessons from some of the better narrators of documentaries to see how to engage her audience. David Attenborough is probably one of the most famous but there are many others.

The invoices are extremely confusing and when we go to pay it is for items we purchased a few months prior which normally isn't bad, but can be when we get to the end of the fiscal year. Also the first page tends to list more items then what the total payment due box says which is confusing. Only list on that page what has to be paid for. Lastly, for our account purposes we need the itemized invoice for what is being paid for in the current invoice. Currently I have to find the previous months invoice to get the itemized list so I can pay the current month's invoice. So in other words, the amount that is due should also have the itemized invoice in the following pages in addition to the other active charges. I can't pay for an item if I can't code it in our budget and I shouldn't have to flip between different invoices from different months to figure it out. Keep it simple. These are the only invoices I have ever seen created in such a convoluted way. Every other invoice I handle is clear about what is being paid for accept this one.
reviews.review_header: ... we purchased a few months prior which normally isn't bad, but can be when we get to the ...

reviews.review_text: While the credit line is a convenience, the invoicing as it is handled by the third-party servicing provider is cumbersome to use. Product descriptions are truncated on the purchase detail provided. This makes it necessary for me to frequently take the extra step to research our purchases on our account in order to be able to code them. There is no total provided on the statement, again adding an extra step so I can be sure I am paying the correct amount. Since I opened the revolving credit line knowing it needed to be paid in full each month, I don't understand the point of checking off the boxes next to each purchase in order to be sure they are credited to the account. I feel with the sophisticated and impressive technology typically employed by Amazon, this style of invoicing is....inconsistent.
reviews.review_header: While the credit line is a convenience, the invoicing ...

reviews.review_text: Even though both my SS and DOB are correctly entered I kept getting the same below as encountered by other reviewers. Error message: "Your response to following fields is invalid Date of Birth can not be less than 8 characters. Social Security Number can not be less than 9 characters."
reviews.review_header: Don't waste your time filling out the form!

reviews.review_text: An absolute must for businesses, churches, etc. I pastor a small church which has a relatively low maximum on our business credit card. Amazon's corporate credit line gave me a very generous maximum credit line, allowed us to be sales tax exempt because we are a non-profit, and it is so simple to make a purchase. We can either use a P.O. Number or just our line of credit. A nicely detailed statement comes in the mail and I verify and approve it and turn it over to our treasurer/accountant for payment. I love it! Easiest way to purchase what we need, receive it with Amazon's always speedy shipment, and settle up when the statement comes in. If you have a church or business and don't have this you are missing out.
reviews.review_header: A nicely detailed statement comes in the mail and I verify ...

reviews.review_text: The site does not work I too am having problems all fields are correct. It comes back and says that SS need to be 9 numbers. Then it says that the Birthdate has to be at least 8 numbers. It does not show any errors but never able to complete the application online.

I like the convenience of ordering things and paying in full. I do not like the way it is set up however. There is an order number when you order but on the credit card statement there is an invoice number and nothing to tie the two together except the amount and listed items. This makes it hard to reconcile the orders with the bill. It takes too much time to figure out. The billing seems to be lag behind quite a bit. We only pay bills once a month so it makes it difficult to make sure all invoices are paid. The statement doesn't reach us until after the deadline for our monthly bills.
reviews.review_header: love the convenience, BUT not the billing cycle

reviews.review_text: It's the easiest way to to have a business account associated with your personal account. This way you can pick and choose which account you want your purchase charged to. Only annoying thing is that the "Corporate" option will not show up as a payment option unless you choose the business address for delivery. I understand that's a security feature to protect against fraud but in our situation it's unnecessary and an annoyance. Other than that, no complaints.

Wish there was a mechanism to have items categorized, such as book, video, video game, office supply, etc. Even if I could input that information when I ordered, it would help with my budget. As it is, I need to go through every invoice (lots) and try to determine which it is and then, if I can't remember, I need to look it up. It is essential to have this broken down for line items within our budget.

Lively characters, simple game play and upbeat music. This game is a joy to play. There are lots of popping bubble games, but the story and style sets this one apart. I thoroughly enjoy relaxing and playing this game!
reviews.review_header: Everything I'd want in a game

reviews.review_text: It can be fun game, I was enjoying it but now I'm stuck at turn number forty. I'm trying to play it but keep getting the messege " the cats are tired try again later" meaning I can't continue playing the game. Of course I could spend real money to buy in game coins to buy the keys to open the gate at turn forty. I've been trying to continue playihg this game for a solid two hours but it just won't let me do it. Yes it is a fun game but if you really want to enjoy it be prepared to spend a good deal of realy money, hence the two star rating and notfour or five.

As a cat's human, Simon's cat cartoons always make me laugh. This game brings together the antics of cats, imaginative scenarios, and the spacial puzzle challenges of a bubble pop game. It's fun for anyone who likes bubble pop puzzles. My 4 year old nephew can play the lower levels on his own & I enjoy the higher levels.
Some levels are harder but keep replaying until I got it.
fun game love simons cat!
Love these games.
Fun game with new power ups at almost every level
The game is fun and challenging. The level to get the keys is frustrating. If you use up all your lives you have to wait a long time before you can play again
